page.title: 02PARTRIDGE GREEN FARMING
page.content: Our area is mainly FARMLAND,owned and run for generations by the same families.There are 11 FARMS, 8 of them forming part of the LOCK ESTATE.Most farms are concerned with REARING LIVESTOCK for DAIRY HERDS.Dairy herds milked in herring-bone parlours,give milk for doorstep deliveries.Some CEREALS: oats,barley and wheat are grown.SHEEP and FOWL are kept and SILAGE stored for the animals winter feed.There are many WOODS and on the Lock Estate they are used for rearing YOUNG PHEASANTS for shooting in season.The 11 farms are:BLANCHES,BRIGHTHAM,CLAYLANDS, CLOTHALLS,GREAT BETLEY,HOBSHORT,HOMELANDS,LLOYTS,LOCK, PINLANDS and ROCKLANDS.
